transArray.content:
Advantages: The location is good, on Qianmen Street, and close to the subway entrance, so it is convenient to travel. The warm service at the front desk is good. There are free drinks and supper. The breakfast is rich and delicious. The rooms are smarter. Children like the food delivery robot very much.
Disadvantages: The room is very small, and the bathroom is separated by a shower room, which makes it difficult to dissipate the smell of the room.
